title: What should I do to start blogging, and is there any chance to get success in this? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are several platforms where you can start your blog, For example:- wordpress, blogger, etc. Once you've made an account you can start writing then, You can use a free plan or a paid one, it's your choice. And about being successful, Yes of course, one can be a successful blogger, but it needs a lot of time and patience. You have to work hard for it, and keep the content realistic and engaging.
